Title: The Law Is the Law
Writer: Jacques Emmanuel (screenplay), Jean-Charles Tacchella (screenplay), Christian-Jaque (adaptation), Jean Manse (adaptation), Agenore Incrocci (adaptation), Furio Scarpelli (adaptation), Jean-Charles Tacchella (adaptation), Jacques Emmanuel (dialogue), Jean Manse (dialogue)
Actors: Totò, Fernandel, Nino Besozzi, Noël Roquevert
Plot: Assola is an imaginary village on the border between Italy and France and the borderline crosses the village itself. The French customs agent Ferdinand is always trying to catch the Italian smuggler Giuseppe. Giuseppe discovers that Ferdinand was actually born in Italy and therefore he can't be a French customs agent.
